long_description: Some emergency bivy sacks get so wet inside from condensation that they leave you soaking. Not so with the water-resistant, breathable SOL Escape bivy. Proprietary fabric lets moisture escape from the inside, yet resists rain, snow and wind on the outside; waterproof seams ensure complete protection. Bivy reflects heat back to you to keep you warm on a cold night. Pull the drawstring on the hood snug to seal in warmth. Side zipper makes getting in and out of the SOL Escape bivy easy. High-visibility orange will catch the eye of rescuers. Bivy packs down small for easy storage and transportation.
short_description: Some emergency bivy sacks get so wet inside from condensation that they leave you soaking. Not so with the water-resistant, breathable SOL Escape bivy.
